channel.title: Hi guys need help if you'd be so kind =D
channel.description:
Ok guy's heres my first post and im glad to be a part of this forums..
Ummm...Ok see im new to this whole rs private server thing and i'm wondering how can i add specials on my satans isle source if you could help you would be a great help and many thanks. Oh and another problem is when i go into my source and click "shops" i can change whats in a shop like say change a iron plate yo a bronze plate but as soon as i try to add a new one bang when i try run my server it goes fatal error exception in main java thread or something please help. =D
Sorry for poor gramma

item.title: Hi guys need help if you'd be so kind =D
